result.execSummary:
The defendant Terry L Powell was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: day(s) RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.  $200 DNA surcharge assessed.
Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law.
Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law.

ZCI

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  No VIOLENT contact with the victim AB (person, property, residence or family).  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Terry L Powell in court with attorney John E. German.  Matthew J Hastings appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Matter is scheduled on the Court's Motion to review bond.
Deft is in non compliance with ZCI.
Def indicates the deft is in treatment now.
Def indicates the deft should test clean today.
Def requests that bond remain as set.
State is requesting a $500 cash bond for reasons stated on the record.
BTC: Modify bond to $300 cash, all other conditions remain.
